text:
Created attachment 25113
Patch containing the changes done to SVGUtilities (Updated version 2)

This version also removes the AffineTransform object passed to the FontRenderContext constructor.
Passing null is equal to passing an identity AffineTransform object.

creator: gadams@apache.org
